com.observability.monitoring.server

Class AggConfigElements

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.observability.monitoring.server.AggConfigElements
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AggConfigElements
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    AggConfigItems is the blueprint for the configuration elements required for aggregation. Objects of configuration should be created of this class. Every object will have several elements that are read from Collectd.conf, which is the configuration file of Collectd, the monitoring framework used in Observability project. Observability team decided to use the existing aggregation configurations from the configuration file to eliminate the number of configuration files used to configure the entire system.
    Author:
    Laila Alhmoud

    History:
    1. Created June 8 2015

    See Also:

                 boolean calNum,

                 boolean calAvg,
                 boolean calMin,
                 boolean calMax,
                 boolean calStd)
        Constructor to set the variables
        Parameters:
        faultTolTimeWindow - is the fault tolerance time window
        interval - is the time in seconds of the integration interval
        plugin - is the specified metric to be aggregated
        typeInst - is metric type
        calSum - is the status of the sum calculation
        calAvg - is the status of the average calculation
        calMin - is the status of the minimum calculation
        calMax - is the status of the maximum calculation
        calStd - is the status of the standard deviation calculation
